name: DISSIDIA 012 Prologus FINAL FANTASY
description:
DISSIDIA 012 Prologus FINAL FANTASY depicts event prior to those in DISSIDIA 012[duodecim] FINAL FANTASY (in stores 3/22/2011). Play this exclusive chapter to get a taste of the new-and-improved battle sytem and new characters!

DISSIDIA 012 Prologus FINAL FANTASY allows Aerith to be unlocked in DISSIDIA 012[duodecim] FINAL FANTASY as an Assist-only character!



CHARACTER DESIGN: TETSUYA NOMURA
